Souléymane Sy Savané bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ivorian
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Goodbye Solo (2008).
A mụrụ ya na mba Côte d'Ivoire, Sy Savané kwagara Paris ma rụọkwa ọrụ dịka onye na-elekọta ụgbọ elu maka Air Afrique
Air Afrique nyere ya visa maka njem na US, n'afọ 2000, Sy Savané biri na New York, ebe ọ gụrụ ime ihe nkiri tupu a tinye ya na Goodbye Solo
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Solo na ihe nkiri Ramin Bahrani nke a na-akpọ Goodbye Solo
A họpụtara ya n'afọ 2009 maka Independent Spirit Award maka Best Male Lead na Gotham Independent Film Award maka Breakthrough Actor.

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya n'afọ 2009 mgbe ọ pụtara na American premiere nke ihe nkiri mpụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ian Bruce nke South Africa Groundswell, nke Scott Eliott duziri, nakwa The New Group na Theatre Row na New York.
N'afọ 2011, Sy Savané pụtakwara na ihe nkiri Machine Gun Preacher nke Gerard Butler, nke Marc Forster duziri
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri nke Deng, onye nnupụisi Sudan.
Kemgbe Machine Gun Preacher, Sy Savané apụtala n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na telivishọn, nke gụnyere Master of None, The Detour, Madam Secretary, na Forever.
N'afọ 2019, Sy Savané pụtara na Suicide by Sunlight, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke Nikyatu Jusu duziri ma bụrụkwa onye nhọpụta gọọmentị nke Sundance Film Festival
Ọ pụtakwara na Killerman, nke Liam Hemsworth, nke Malik Bader duziri.
